titleStmt.title: Certaine necessarie articles set out by the Archbishop of Yorke and his associates, commissioners in causes ecclesiasticall, to be obserued in the diocesse of Yorke, 158[4?] Martij 3
titleStmt.author: Church of England. Diocese of York. Archbishop (1576-1588 : Sandys)

notesStmt.note: Date in title on t.p. altered by pen to 1583.
Signed at bottom: Edwyne Eborum, Mathewe Hutton, Ro. Lougher, VVilliam Palmer, Henry VVright, Ry. Percy.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
